verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy
Holy Holy Holy
Holy is the Lord God Almighty

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Worthy to receive glory
Worthy to receive honor
Worthy to receive all our praise today

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So we'll
Praise Him
Praise Him and lift Him up
We'll Praise Him
Exalt His name forever

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We'll Praise Him
Praise Him and lift Him up
We'll Praise Him
Exalt His name forever more
